description.translate: Shine, marvel and motivate by your charisma, because only you alone could.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Prince de Sylberländ\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Rayonne, émerveille et motive\"}","{\"text\":\"§7par ton charisme, car toi seul le saurais.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Shine, marvel and motivate by\"}","{\"text\":\"§7your charisma, because only you alone could.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
